reg_pit.title: Land Tax Deferment Administration Fee Remission Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 181/2010, effective June 25, 2010.

reg.title: Land Tax Deferment Administration Fee Remission Regulation

section.sectiontext: Authorization is given for the remission of application and renewal fees payable in respect of a deferral agreement requested by a person who meets the requirements of section 5 (2.1) of the Land Tax Deferment Act for the 2009 or 2010 taxation year.

content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Financial Administration Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 138, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 19]
